column1: SC011 LAW JUNCTION TO UDDINGSTON JUNCTION (VIA HOLYTOWN)

*May be reduced by 1⁄2 if equivalent (pathing time) inserted between Shieldmuir and Wishaw
RestrictionsPathing time must not be used between Holytown Junction and Holytown, due to there being no intermediatesignals.
